data.text: @TheQuirkyHR Hi Zafar, drones are only allowed as check-in baggage. The batteries must be removed and can be carried as hand baggage only, the battery terminals should be insulated to avoid any unintentional short circuit. The maximum watt hour of the battery must not exceed 160 WH.
